page.title: 02HOW TO PLAY BUNG OFF
page.content:
Any amount of people can play.
What you do is choose a post,then the person thats on,counts to 100 in 1's slowly.While he or she's doing that the rest hide.Then when the counter finishes counting he or she looks for the people who are hidden. If the counter sees a person, they both run back to the post and if the first person there is the hider, they say "1 2 3 myself"and if it's the counter "1 2 3 bung off_who ever it is." If the counter says it first then that person is caught.If the hider says it first then that person is free.You carry on like this till everyone's caught or free and then the first person caught is on for a new game of B U N G O F F.
